title: Ep 88 | Phil Sings AC/DC, the Funniest Things in the Bible, and the Woman of 'Crafty Intent'
description:
Phil's not into current pop music, but he has no trouble belting out AC/DC lyrics during Bible study. Jase calls out Phil's cellphone hypocrisy. And the guys talk about the funniest stories and conversations in the Bible, Jesus' Sabbath controversy, preachers who tell crude jokes, making a covenant with your eyes, and the story of the young man and the adulteress in Proverbs 7.
